titleStmt.title: Of publick baptism a sermon / preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and the Court of Aldermen at Guild-Hall Chapel, Sunday, Nov. 20, 1692 by Philip Stubs.
titleStmt.author: Stubs, Philip, 1665-1738.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
